S.FORM: John Arthurs sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1947, ryax sa tay 15 nqu tay 8, John Arthurs, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

John Arthors sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1947, ryax sa tay 15 nqo tay 8, John Arthors, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
